amendment.description: To extend the STOCK Act to ensure that the reporting requirements set forth in the STOCK Act apply to the executive branch and independent agencies.

action.text: Amendment SA 1511 proposed by Senator Gillibrand for Senator Lieberman to Amendment SA 1470.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1511 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 81 - 18. Record Vote Number: 6.
